2639
2640 bool IsOver(float* position, float pixelRadius)
2641 {
2642 const ImGuiIO& io = ImGui::GetIO();
2643
2644 float radius = sqrtf((ImLengthSqr(worldToPos({ position[0], position[1], position[2], 0.0f }, gContext.mViewProjection) - io.MousePos)));
2645 return radius < pixelRadius;
2646 }
2647
2648 bool Manipulate(const float* view, const float* projection, OPERATION operation, MODE mode, float* matrix, float* deltaMatrix, const float* snap, const float* localBounds, const float* boundsSnap)
2649 {
2650 gContext.mDrawList->PushClipRect (ImVec2 (gContext.mX, gContext.mY), ImVec2 (gContext.mX + gContext.mWidth, gContext.mY + gContext.mHeight), false);
2651
2652 // Scale is always local or matrix will be skewed when applying world scale or oriented matrix
2653 ComputeContext(view, projection, matrix, (operation & SCALE) ? LOCAL : mode);
2654
2655 // set delta to identity
2656 if (deltaMatrix)
2657 {
2658 ((matrix_t*)deltaMatrix)->SetToIdentity();
2659 }
2660
2661 // behind camera
2662 vec_t camSpacePosition;
2663 camSpacePosition.TransformPoint(makeVect(0.f, 0.f, 0.f), gContext.mMVP);
2664 if (!gContext.mIsOrthographic && camSpacePosition.z < 0.001f && !gContext.mbUsing)
2665 {
2666 return false;
2667 }
2668
2669 // --
2670 int type = MT_NONE;
2671 bool manipulated = false;
2672 if (gContext.mbEnable)
2673 {
2674 if (!gContext.mbUsingBounds)
2675 {
2676 manipulated = HandleTranslation(matrix, deltaMatrix, operation, type, snap) ||
2677 HandleScale(matrix, deltaMatrix, operation, type, snap) ||
2678 HandleRotation(matrix, deltaMatrix, operation, type, snap);
2679 }
2680 }
2681
2682 if (localBounds && !gContext.mbUsing)
2683 {
2684 HandleAndDrawLocalBounds(localBounds, (matrix_t*)matrix, boundsSnap, operation);
2685 }
2686
2687 gContext.mOperation = operation;
2688 if (!gContext.mbUsingBounds)
2689 {
2690 DrawRotationGizmo(operation, type);
2691 DrawTranslationGizmo(operation, type);
2692 DrawScaleGizmo(operation, type);
2693 DrawScaleUniveralGizmo(operation, type);
2694 }
2695
2696 gContext.mDrawList->PopClipRect ();
2697 return manipulated;
2698 }

2701 {
2702 gContext.mGizmoSizeClipSpace = value;
2703 }
2704
2706 void ComputeFrustumPlanes(vec_t* frustum, const float* clip)
2707 {
2708 frustum[0].x = clip[3] - clip[0];
2709 frustum[0].y = clip[7] - clip[4];
2710 frustum[0].z = clip[11] - clip[8];
2711 frustum[0].w = clip[15] - clip[12];
2712
2713 frustum[1].x = clip[3] + clip[0];
2714 frustum[1].y = clip[7] + clip[4];
2715 frustum[1].z = clip[11] + clip[8];
2716 frustum[1].w = clip[15] + clip[12];
2717
2718 frustum[2].x = clip[3] + clip[1];
2719 frustum[2].y = clip[7] + clip[5];
2720 frustum[2].z = clip[11] + clip[9];
2721 frustum[2].w = clip[15] + clip[13];
2722
2723 frustum[3].x = clip[3] - clip[1];
2724 frustum[3].y = clip[7] - clip[5];
2725 frustum[3].z = clip[11] - clip[9];
2726 frustum[3].w = clip[15] - clip[13];
2727
2728 frustum[4].x = clip[3] - clip[2];
2729 frustum[4].y = clip[7] - clip[6];
2730 frustum[4].z = clip[11] - clip[10];
2731 frustum[4].w = clip[15] - clip[14];
2732
2733 frustum[5].x = clip[3] + clip[2];
2734 frustum[5].y = clip[7] + clip[6];
2735 frustum[5].z = clip[11] + clip[10];
2736 frustum[5].w = clip[15] + clip[14];
2737
2738 for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
2739 {
2740 frustum[i].Normalize();
2741 }
2742 }
2743
2744 void DrawCubes(const float* view, const float* projection, const float* matrices, int matrixCount)
2745 {
2746 matrix_t viewInverse;
2747 viewInverse.Inverse(*(matrix_t*)view);
2748
2749 struct CubeFace
2750 {
2751 float z;
2752 ImVec2 faceCoordsScreen[4];
2753 ImU32 color;
2754 };
2755 CubeFace* faces = (CubeFace*)_malloca(sizeof(CubeFace) * matrixCount * 6);
2756
2757 if (!faces)
2758 {
2759 return;
2760 }
2761
2762 vec_t frustum[6];
2763 matrix_t viewProjection = *(matrix_t*)view * *(matrix_t*)projection;
2764 ComputeFrustumPlanes(frustum, viewProjection.m16);
2765
2766 int cubeFaceCount = 0;
2767 for (int cube = 0; cube < matrixCount; cube++)
2768 {
2769 const float* matrix = &matrices[cube * 16];
2770
2771 matrix_t res = *(matrix_t*)matrix * *(matrix_t*)view * *(matrix_t*)projection;
2772
2773 for (int iFace = 0; iFace < 6; iFace++)
2774 {
2775 const int normalIndex = (iFace % 3);
2776 const int perpXIndex = (normalIndex + 1) % 3;
2777 const int perpYIndex = (normalIndex + 2) % 3;
2778 const float invert = (iFace > 2) ? -1.f : 1.f;
2779
2780 const vec_t faceCoords[4] = { directionUnary[normalIndex] + directionUnary[perpXIndex] + directionUnary[perpYIndex],
2781 directionUnary[normalIndex] + directionUnary[perpXIndex] - directionUnary[perpYIndex],
2782 directionUnary[normalIndex] - directionUnary[perpXIndex] - directionUnary[perpYIndex],
2783 directionUnary[normalIndex] - directionUnary[perpXIndex] + directionUnary[perpYIndex],
2784 };
2785
2786 // clipping
2787 /*
2788 bool skipFace = false;
2789 for (unsigned int iCoord = 0; iCoord < 4; iCoord++)
2790 {
2791 vec_t camSpacePosition;
2792 camSpacePosition.TransformPoint(faceCoords[iCoord] * 0.5f * invert, res);
2793 if (camSpacePosition.z < 0.001f)
2794 {
2795 skipFace = true;
2796 break;
2797 }
2798 }
2799 if (skipFace)
2800 {
2801 continue;
2802 }
2803 */
2804 vec_t centerPosition, centerPositionVP;
2805 centerPosition.TransformPoint(directionUnary[normalIndex] * 0.5f * invert, *(matrix_t*)matrix);
2806 centerPositionVP.TransformPoint(directionUnary[normalIndex] * 0.5f * invert, res);
2807
2808 bool inFrustum = true;
2809 for (int iFrustum = 0; iFrustum < 6; iFrustum++)
2810 {
2811 float dist = DistanceToPlane(centerPosition, frustum[iFrustum]);
2812 if (dist < 0.f)
2813 {
2814 inFrustum = false;
2815 break;
2816 }
2817 }
2818
2819 if (!inFrustum)
2820 {
2821 continue;
2822 }
2823 CubeFace& cubeFace = faces[cubeFaceCount];
2824
2825 // 3D->2D
2826 //ImVec2 faceCoordsScreen[4];
2827 for (unsigned int iCoord = 0; iCoord < 4; iCoord++)
2828 {
2829 cubeFace.faceCoordsScreen[iCoord] = worldToPos(faceCoords[iCoord] * 0.5f * invert, res);
2830 }
2831
2832 ImU32 directionColor = GetColorU32(DIRECTION_X + normalIndex);
2833 cubeFace.color = directionColor | IM_COL32(0x80, 0x80, 0x80, 0);
2834
2835 cubeFace.z = centerPositionVP.z / centerPositionVP.w;
2836 cubeFaceCount++;
2837 }
2838 }
2839 qsort(faces, cubeFaceCount, sizeof(CubeFace), [](void const* _a, void const* _b) {
2840 CubeFace* a = (CubeFace*)_a;
2841 CubeFace* b = (CubeFace*)_b;
2842 if (a->z < b->z)
2843 {
2844 return 1;
2845 }
2846 return -1;
2847 });
2848 // draw face with lighter color
2849 for (int iFace = 0; iFace < cubeFaceCount; iFace++)
2850 {
2851 const CubeFace& cubeFace = faces[iFace];
2852 gContext.mDrawList->AddConvexPolyFilled(cubeFace.faceCoordsScreen, 4, cubeFace.color);
2853 }
2854
2855 _freea(faces);
2856 }
2857
2858 void DrawGrid(const float* view, const float* projection, const float* matrix, const float gridSize)
2859 {
2860 matrix_t viewProjection = *(matrix_t*)view * *(matrix_t*)projection;
2861 vec_t frustum[6];
2862 ComputeFrustumPlanes(frustum, viewProjection.m16);
2863 matrix_t res = *(matrix_t*)matrix * viewProjection;
2864
2865 for (float f = -gridSize; f <= gridSize; f += 1.f)
2866 {
2867 for (int dir = 0; dir < 2; dir++)
2868 {
2869 vec_t ptA = makeVect(dir ? -gridSize : f, 0.f, dir ? f : -gridSize);
2870 vec_t ptB = makeVect(dir ? gridSize : f, 0.f, dir ? f : gridSize);
2871 bool visible = true;
2872 for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
2873 {
2874 float dA = DistanceToPlane(ptA, frustum[i]);
2875 float dB = DistanceToPlane(ptB, frustum[i]);
2876 if (dA < 0.f && dB < 0.f)
2877 {
2878 visible = false;
2879 break;
2880 }
2881 if (dA > 0.f && dB > 0.f)
2882 {
2883 continue;
2884 }
2885 if (dA < 0.f)
2886 {
2887 float len = fabsf(dA - dB);
2888 float t = fabsf(dA) / len;
2889 ptA.Lerp(ptB, t);
2890 }
2891 if (dB < 0.f)
2892 {
2893 float len = fabsf(dB - dA);
2894 float t = fabsf(dB) / len;
2895 ptB.Lerp(ptA, t);
2896 }
2897 }
2898 if (visible)
2899 {
2900 ImU32 col = IM_COL32(0x80, 0x80, 0x80, 0xFF);
2901 col = (fmodf(fabsf(f), 10.f) < FLT_EPSILON) ? IM_COL32(0x90, 0x90, 0x90, 0xFF) : col;
2902 col = (fabsf(f) < FLT_EPSILON) ? IM_COL32(0x40, 0x40, 0x40, 0xFF): col;
2903
2904 float thickness = 1.f;
2905 thickness = (fmodf(fabsf(f), 10.f) < FLT_EPSILON) ? 1.5f : thickness;
2906 thickness = (fabsf(f) < FLT_EPSILON) ? 2.3f : thickness;
2907
2908 gContext.mDrawList->AddLine(worldToPos(ptA, res), worldToPos(ptB, res), col, thickness);
2909 }
2910 }
2911 }
2912 }

2914 void ViewManipulate(float* view, const float* projection, OPERATION operation, MODE mode, float* matrix, float length, ImVec2 position, ImVec2 size, ImU32 backgroundColor)
2915 {
2916 // Scale is always local or matrix will be skewed when applying world scale or oriented matrix
2917 ComputeContext(view, projection, matrix, (operation & SCALE) ? LOCAL : mode);
2918 ViewManipulate(view, length, position, size, backgroundColor);
2919 }
2920
2921 void ViewManipulate(float* view, float length, ImVec2 position, ImVec2 size, ImU32 backgroundColor)
2922 {
2923 static bool isDraging = false;
2924 static bool isClicking = false;
2925 static vec_t interpolationUp;
2926 static vec_t interpolationDir;
2927 static int interpolationFrames = 0;
2928 const vec_t referenceUp = makeVect(0.f, 1.f, 0.f);
2929
2930 matrix_t svgView, svgProjection;
2931 svgView = gContext.mViewMat;
2932 svgProjection = gContext.mProjectionMat;
2933
2934 ImGuiIO& io = ImGui::GetIO();
2935 gContext.mDrawList->AddRectFilled(position, position + size, backgroundColor);
2936 matrix_t viewInverse;
2937 viewInverse.Inverse(*(matrix_t*)view);
2938
2939 const vec_t camTarget = viewInverse.v.position - viewInverse.v.dir * length;
2940
2941 // view/projection matrices
2942 const float distance = 3.f;
2943 matrix_t cubeProjection, cubeView;
2944 float fov = acosf(distance / (sqrtf(distance * distance + 3.f))) * RAD2DEG;
2945 Perspective(fov / sqrtf(2.f), size.x / size.y, 0.01f, 1000.f, cubeProjection.m16);
2946
2947 vec_t dir = makeVect(viewInverse.m[2][0], viewInverse.m[2][1], viewInverse.m[2][2]);
2948 vec_t up = makeVect(viewInverse.m[1][0], viewInverse.m[1][1], viewInverse.m[1][2]);
2949 vec_t eye = dir * distance;
2950 vec_t zero = makeVect(0.f, 0.f);
2951 LookAt(&eye.x, &zero.x, &up.x, cubeView.m16);
2952
2953 // set context
2954 gContext.mViewMat = cubeView;
2955 gContext.mProjectionMat = cubeProjection;
2956 ComputeCameraRay(gContext.mRayOrigin, gContext.mRayVector, position, size);
2957
2958 const matrix_t res = cubeView * cubeProjection;
2959
2960 // panels
2961 static const ImVec2 panelPosition[9] = { ImVec2(0.75f,0.75f), ImVec2(0.25f, 0.75f), ImVec2(0.f, 0.75f),
2962 ImVec2(0.75f, 0.25f), ImVec2(0.25f, 0.25f), ImVec2(0.f, 0.25f),
2963 ImVec2(0.75f, 0.f), ImVec2(0.25f, 0.f), ImVec2(0.f, 0.f) };
2964
2965 static const ImVec2 panelSize[9] = { ImVec2(0.25f,0.25f), ImVec2(0.5f, 0.25f), ImVec2(0.25f, 0.25f),
2966 ImVec2(0.25f, 0.5f), ImVec2(0.5f, 0.5f), ImVec2(0.25f, 0.5f),
2967 ImVec2(0.25f, 0.25f), ImVec2(0.5f, 0.25f), ImVec2(0.25f, 0.25f) };
2968
2969 // tag faces
2970 bool boxes[27]{};
2971 static int overBox = -1;
2972 for (int iPass = 0; iPass < 2; iPass++)
2973 {
2974 for (int iFace = 0; iFace < 6; iFace++)
2975 {
2976 const int normalIndex = (iFace % 3);
2977 const int perpXIndex = (normalIndex + 1) % 3;
2978 const int perpYIndex = (normalIndex + 2) % 3;
2979 const float invert = (iFace > 2) ? -1.f : 1.f;
2980 const vec_t indexVectorX = directionUnary[perpXIndex] * invert;
2981 const vec_t indexVectorY = directionUnary[perpYIndex] * invert;
2982 const vec_t boxOrigin = directionUnary[normalIndex] * -invert - indexVectorX - indexVectorY;
2983
2984 // plan local space
2985 const vec_t n = directionUnary[normalIndex] * invert;
2986 vec_t viewSpaceNormal = n;
2987 vec_t viewSpacePoint = n * 0.5f;
2988 viewSpaceNormal.TransformVector(cubeView);
2989 viewSpaceNormal.Normalize();
2990 viewSpacePoint.TransformPoint(cubeView);
2991 const vec_t viewSpaceFacePlan = BuildPlan(viewSpacePoint, viewSpaceNormal);
2992
2993 // back face culling
2994 if (viewSpaceFacePlan.w > 0.f)
2995 {
2996 continue;
2997 }
2998
2999 const vec_t facePlan = BuildPlan(n * 0.5f, n);
3000
3001 const float len = IntersectRayPlane(gContext.mRayOrigin, gContext.mRayVector, facePlan);
3002 vec_t posOnPlan = gContext.mRayOrigin + gContext.mRayVector * len - (n * 0.5f);
3003
3004 float localx = Dot(directionUnary[perpXIndex], posOnPlan) * invert + 0.5f;
3005 float localy = Dot(directionUnary[perpYIndex], posOnPlan) * invert + 0.5f;
3006
3007 // panels
3008 const vec_t dx = directionUnary[perpXIndex];
3009 const vec_t dy = directionUnary[perpYIndex];
3010 const vec_t origin = directionUnary[normalIndex] - dx - dy;
3011 for (int iPanel = 0; iPanel < 9; iPanel++)
3012 {
3013 vec_t boxCoord = boxOrigin + indexVectorX * float(iPanel % 3) + indexVectorY * float(iPanel / 3) + makeVect(1.f, 1.f, 1.f);
3014 const ImVec2 p = panelPosition[iPanel] * 2.f;
3015 const ImVec2 s = panelSize[iPanel] * 2.f;
3016 ImVec2 faceCoordsScreen[4];
3017 vec_t panelPos[4] = { dx * p.x + dy * p.y,
3018 dx * p.x + dy * (p.y + s.y),
3019 dx * (p.x + s.x) + dy * (p.y + s.y),
3020 dx * (p.x + s.x) + dy * p.y };
3021
3022 for (unsigned int iCoord = 0; iCoord < 4; iCoord++)
3023 {
3024 faceCoordsScreen[iCoord] = worldToPos((panelPos[iCoord] + origin) * 0.5f * invert, res, position, size);
3025 }
3026
3027 const ImVec2 panelCorners[2] = { panelPosition[iPanel], panelPosition[iPanel] + panelSize[iPanel] };
3028 bool insidePanel = localx > panelCorners[0].x && localx < panelCorners[1].x && localy > panelCorners[0].y && localy < panelCorners[1].y;
3029 int boxCoordInt = int(boxCoord.x * 9.f + boxCoord.y * 3.f + boxCoord.z);
3030 IM_ASSERT(boxCoordInt < 27);
3031 boxes[boxCoordInt] |= insidePanel && (!isDraging) && gContext.mbMouseOver;
3032
3033 // draw face with lighter color
3034 if (iPass)
3035 {
3036 ImU32 directionColor = GetColorU32(DIRECTION_X + normalIndex);
3037 gContext.mDrawList->AddConvexPolyFilled(faceCoordsScreen, 4, (directionColor | IM_COL32(0x80, 0x80, 0x80, 0x80)) | (gContext.mIsViewManipulatorHovered ? IM_COL32(0x08, 0x08, 0x08, 0) : 0));
3038 if (boxes[boxCoordInt])
3039 {
3040 gContext.mDrawList->AddConvexPolyFilled(faceCoordsScreen, 4, IM_COL32(0xF0, 0xA0, 0x60, 0x80));
3041
3042 if (io.MouseDown[0] && !isClicking && !isDraging && GImGui->ActiveId == 0) {
3043 overBox = boxCoordInt;
3044 isClicking = true;
3045 isDraging = true;
3046 }
3047 }
3048 }
3049 }
3050 }
3051 }
3052 if (interpolationFrames)
3053 {
3054 interpolationFrames--;
3055 vec_t newDir = viewInverse.v.dir;
3056 newDir.Lerp(interpolationDir, 0.2f);
3057 newDir.Normalize();
3058
3059 vec_t newUp = viewInverse.v.up;
3060 newUp.Lerp(interpolationUp, 0.3f);
3061 newUp.Normalize();
3062 newUp = interpolationUp;
3063 vec_t newEye = camTarget + newDir * length;
3064 LookAt(&newEye.x, &camTarget.x, &newUp.x, view);
3065 }
3066 gContext.mIsViewManipulatorHovered = gContext.mbMouseOver && ImRect(position, position + size).Contains(io.MousePos);
3067
3068 if (io.MouseDown[0] && (fabsf(io.MouseDelta[0]) || fabsf(io.MouseDelta[1])) && isClicking)
3069 {
3070 isClicking = false;
3071 }
3072
3073 if (!io.MouseDown[0])
3074 {
3075 if (isClicking)
3076 {
3077 // apply new view direction
3078 int cx = overBox / 9;
3079 int cy = (overBox - cx * 9) / 3;
3080 int cz = overBox % 3;
3081 interpolationDir = makeVect(1.f - (float)cx, 1.f - (float)cy, 1.f - (float)cz);
3082 interpolationDir.Normalize();
3083
3084 if (fabsf(Dot(interpolationDir, referenceUp)) > 1.0f - 0.01f)
3085 {
3086 vec_t right = viewInverse.v.right;
3087 if (fabsf(right.x) > fabsf(right.z))
3088 {
3089 right.z = 0.f;
3090 }
3091 else
3092 {
3093 right.x = 0.f;
3094 }
3095 right.Normalize();
3096 interpolationUp = Cross(interpolationDir, right);
3097 interpolationUp.Normalize();
3098 }
3099 else
3100 {
3101 interpolationUp = referenceUp;
3102 }
3103 interpolationFrames = 40;
3104
3105 }
3106 isClicking = false;
3107 isDraging = false;
3108 }
3109
3110
3111 if (isDraging)
3112 {
3113 matrix_t rx, ry, roll;
3114
3115 rx.RotationAxis(referenceUp, -io.MouseDelta.x * 0.01f);
3116 ry.RotationAxis(viewInverse.v.right, -io.MouseDelta.y * 0.01f);
3117
3118 roll = rx * ry;
3119
3120 vec_t newDir = viewInverse.v.dir;
3121 newDir.TransformVector(roll);
3122 newDir.Normalize();
3123
3124 // clamp
3125 vec_t planDir = Cross(viewInverse.v.right, referenceUp);
3126 planDir.y = 0.f;
3127 planDir.Normalize();
3128 float dt = Dot(planDir, newDir);
3129 if (dt < 0.0f)
3130 {
3131 newDir += planDir * dt;
3132 newDir.Normalize();
3133 }
3134
3135 vec_t newEye = camTarget + newDir * length;
3136 LookAt(&newEye.x, &camTarget.x, &referenceUp.x, view);
3137 }
3138
3139 gContext.mbUsingViewManipulate = (interpolationFrames != 0) || isDraging;
3140 if (isClicking || gContext.mbUsingViewManipulate || gContext.mIsViewManipulatorHovered) {
3141#if IMGUI_VERSION_NUM >= 18723
3142 ImGui::SetNextFrameWantCaptureMouse(true);
3143#else
3144 ImGui::CaptureMouseFromApp();
3145#endif
3146 }
3147
3148 // restore view/projection because it was used to compute ray
3149 ComputeContext(svgView.m16, svgProjection.m16, gContext.mModelSource.m16, gContext.mMode);
3150 }
3151};
